name: 12"~30"BRAZILIAN LOOSE WAVE HAIR 5A GRADE **AAAAA** CELEBRITY QUALITY
description: Brazilian & Peruvian Hair blends really nice with African American and some Caucasian textures. It's a little thicker than Indian or Malaysian and the Peruvian hair is curlier by nature than the other countries'. There is minimal to no shedding of our hair. Loose Wave pattern and is ideal for straight, heat curled, and natural wave styling options. Loose Wave comes in it's natural dark brown/black color. This hair can be dyed and straightened.

name: 12"~38"INDIAN DEEP WAVE/CURLY HAIR 4A GRADE ***AAAA***
description:
This Indian Deep Wave/Curly hair comes from men & women donors in India & Pakistan. Indian Deep hair has a wave that becomes curly after product or water is put in it. The hair can be made straight using the iron straightening method and due to its natural curls it normally goes back when it is wet.
Comes in Natural Color, 1B, or Dark Browns.

For a full head if purchase in any kind of weft your will definitely need at least 3 bundles=300g's of hair and for those of you who like extra thickness you will need 4 bundles=400g. 3 bundles will give you the normal fullness. Please note the hair may be a bit shorter due to the density of the curls. So choose your length accordingly. Email:hautecouturehair_904@yahoo.com forthe purchasing of 3 or more bundle package deals and after we confirm your packge price a invoice will be sent via paypal.

name: 12"~30" BRAZILIAN BODY WAVE HAIR 5A GRADE **AAAAA** CELEBRITY QUALITY
description:
100% natural color virgin human hair without any synthetic hair mixed inside. The cuticles are kept intact. It has not been chemically treated in any fashion. No coloring, perms or any other processing has taken place.

We comb and wash the hair before sending to the customers so it is soft and shining and tangle-free. You can dye our hair into any color after you buy them. No Shedding with this 5A Grade Hair.

Grade 5A is the best quality hair also the most expensive
***Hair will last 2 years with proper care maintenance***  
Hair comes in the following Colors: 1b, natural black, or brown
